title: John Arden: playwright
creator_credit: Mithras Films, David Naden and Associates, David Naden and John irvin
brief_description: A study of the modern British playwright, John Arden, by a group of young filmmakers. They have attempted “to make the business of being a playwright seem less remote, more immediate and understandable”. reveals the effect of his wife’s criticism upon his writing. Filmed at his home in Yorkshire.
